titles.title: Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2017
Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2017
To improve Federal sentencing and corrections practices, and for other purposes.
Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Energy and Commerce, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
